text: Hagalongo! Au gu longono eau nia lee o agu daangada ala e wwolowwolo i lodo tenua i nia gowaa huogodoo boloo, “E hai behee? Dimaadua la gu hagalee i Zion? Di King o Zion la gu hagalee noho i golo?” Dimaadua go di nadau King ga helekai, “Goodou e aha ala e hai Au gi hagawelewele gi godou hai daumaha gi godou balu ieidu, mo godou palapala gi lala i mua nia balu god o digau tuadimee ala ono hadinga ai?”
